Manipulators

Class ScaleConstructor

  • java.lang.Object
    • Manipulators.ScaleConstructor

  • public class ScaleConstructor
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that implements the singleton pattern. Used to construct scales.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      KeyLetterEnum[] validKeys 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      java.util.List<Scale> assessDiatonicScale(java.util.List<KeyLetterEnum> e)
      Assesses which diatonic scales the given collection of keys are most likely to belong to.
      Scale constructScale(KeyLetterEnum scaleRoot, ScaleModeEnum scaleMode)
      Returns a Scale object which contains an ordered sequence of KeyLetterEnums which represents the notes contained within the given key.
      static ScaleConstructor getInstance() 
      Scale getRelativeMajor(KeyLetterEnum letter)
      Constructs the relative major scale of the minor scale of the given key.
      Scale getRelativeMinor(KeyLetterEnum letter)
      Constructs the relative minor scale of the given key

        Constructs the relative minor scale of the given key
        Parameters:
        letter - the key from which to obtain the relative minor
        Returns:
        the relative minor of the major scale of the key

      • getRelativeMajor

        public Scale getRelativeMajor(KeyLetterEnum letter)
        Constructs the relative major scale of the minor scale of the given key.
        Parameters:
        letter - the key from which to assess the relative major
        Returns:

      • constructScale

        public Scale constructScale(KeyLetterEnum scaleRoot,
                            ScaleModeEnum scaleMode)
        Returns a Scale object which contains an ordered sequence of KeyLetterEnums which represents the notes contained within the given key.
        Parameters:
        scaleRoot - the tonic of the scale
        scaleMode - the scale mode to be used in constructing the scale
        Returns:
        a Scale object containing an ordered sequence of KeyLetterEnums representing an ascending scale.

      • assessDiatonicScale

        public java.util.List<Scale> assessDiatonicScale(java.util.List<KeyLetterEnum> e)
        Assesses which diatonic scales the given collection of keys are most likely to belong to.
        Parameters:
        e - a list of keys
        Returns:
        a list of likely diatonic scales
